channel.title: M. chimaera on ntmscope
channel.description: Recent content in M. chimaera on ntmscope

item.title: Presentation at DanGeRoUS Mycobacteria Club Borstel
item.description:
Nils Wetzstein is giving a presentation at this year's DanGeRoUS Mycobacteria Club at Research Center Borstel on February 2nd.

It will also involve data from our meta-analysis on HCU-associated M. chimaera infections. More information on the homepage.

We will be happy to see you there!
